# pubspec

Update all package versions in flutter pubspec.yaml

## Installation and Usage

1. [Python3](https://www.python.org/downloads/) required
2. Install pubspec
```
pip3 install pubspec
```
3. Run pubspec in same directory as pubspec.yaml file
```
pubspec
```
